title: Adwords campaign for IT company
snippet:
I have an adwords campaign and I'm not happy with it. I'm not sure in keywords and ads text so what I need is a real expert in adwords. I want you to collect all keywords for mobile applications development and give it to me. Next step I will filter this list and leave only relevant keywords. And then you will create 2 ads for each keyword.
I will manage my company myself, I need from you only collecting keywords and creating ads.
I won't give you existing campaign not to confuse you with wrong direction, so make me this from scratch.
